Avalon Wizard 1.2.0

CONTENT
1. License Info
2. Desing Time Support
3. MVVM extensions
4. Getting help



1. LICENCE INFO

Copyright © Pavel Fedarovich, 2010-2012

You may at your option receive a license to Avalon Wizard under 
either the terms of the Apache License version 2.0 or 
the GNU Lesser General Public License (LGPL) version 2.1 or any later version.
 
AvalonWizard is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
 
You may obtain a copy of the Apache License at [http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0].
You may obtain a copy of the LGPL at [http://www.gnu.org/licenses/].



2. DESIGN TIME SUPPORT

In order to enable design-time support, please, download and install 
the Avalon Wizard MSI package from [http://avalonwizard.codeplex.com/].
The design-time support is provided for Microsoft Visual Studio (2010/2012) and
Microsoft Expression Blend (3/4).



3. MVVM EXTENSIONS

In order to simplify using Avalon Wizard with MVVM pattern you may download
Avalon Wizard MVVM Extensions package from NuGet.




4. GETTING HELP

AvalonWizard Reference.chm file is included in the content folder of this package.
If you have any questions on AvalonWizard, feel free to ask them on 
[http://avalonwizard.codeplex.com/discussions].
